duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide QA on the Floor oversight of manufacturing operations and review documentation for compliance
Perform AQL visual inspection of drug product and review/approve batch documents for media and buffer prep solutions
Compile deviations observed on the floor and move to completion within the required time frame
Provide dedicated QA quality floor oversight of GMP operations for the manufacture of master/working cell banks, bulk drug substance, and final drug product
Perform audits of manufacturing and support areas, including in-process batch record review for adherence to internal procedures and Good Documentation Practices
Identify and implement continuous improvement initiatives and participate in site and corporate quality and process improvement initiatives
Represent QA on project teams and guide personnel involved in GMP operations pertaining to cGMP compliance, internal procedures, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; STEM preferred. Master’s degree preferred
